Name: abs
Description: Returns the absolute value of a numeric parameter.

Arguments.Description: A numeric parameter to get the absolute value from.

Name: min
Description: Returns the minimum value from a list of numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: max
Description: Returns the maximum value from a list of numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: avg
Description: Returns the average value from a list of numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: sum
Description: Returns the sum of all numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Description: Returns the sum of all numeric arguments (alias for sum).

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: pow
Description: Returns the result of raising the first parameter to the power of the second parameter.

Arguments.Description: The base value to raise to a power.
The exponent value.

Name: sqrt
Description: Returns the square root of a numeric parameter.

Arguments.Description: A numeric parameter to calculate the square root for.

Name: round
Description: Rounds a number to a specified number of digits.

Arguments.Description: The number to round.
The number of digits to round to (default 0).

Name: floor
Description: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified number.

Arguments.Description: The number to floor.

Name: ceiling
Description: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the specified number.

Arguments.Description: The number to ceiling.

Name: trunc
Description: Calculates the integral part of a number.

Arguments.Description: The number to truncate.

Name: sign
Description: Returns an integer that indicates the sign of a number.

Arguments.Description: The number to get the sign of.

Name: random
Description: Returns a random number. With no arguments, returns a double between 0.0 and 1.0. With two arguments, returns a random integer between min (inclusive) and max (exclusive).

Arguments.Description: Optional range arguments.
Min value (inclusive).
Max value (exclusive).
